mapper.update: update member set member_password = #{member_password}, member_email = #{member_email}, member_zipcode = #{member_zipcode}, member_address1=#{member_address1},member_address2=#{member_address2}, member_phone1 = #{member_phone1}, member_phone2=#{member_phone2} where member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.select: select userorder.*,book.book_name from userorder join book on userorder.book_isbn = book.book_isbn where member_id = #{member_id}
